verses.verse: My <S%G3450><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> masters, <S%G1320><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we shall receive <S%G2983><s%> the greater <S%G3187><s%> condemnation. <S%G2917><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> in many things <S%G4183><s%> we offend <S%G4417><s%> all. <S%G537><s%> If any man <S%G1536><s%> offend <S%G4417><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> is a perfect <S%G5046><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> and able <S%G1415><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to bridle <S%G5468><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we put <S%G906><s%> bits <S%G5469><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> horses' <S%G2462><s%> mouths, <S%G4750><s%> that they <S%G846><s%> may obey <S%G3982><s%> us; <S%G2254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we turn about <S%G3329><s%> their <S%G846><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

Behold <S%G2400><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ships, <S%G4143><s%> which though they be <S%G5607><s%> so great, <S%G5082><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are driven <S%G1643><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> fierce <S%G4642><s%> winds, <S%G417><s%> yet are they turned about <S%G3329><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> a very small <S%G1646><s%> helm, <S%G4079><s%> whithersoever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G302><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> governor <S%G3730><s%> <S%G2116><s%> listeth. <S%G1014><s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> member, <S%G3196><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> boasteth great things. <S%G3166><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> how great <S%G2245><s%> a matter <S%G5208><s%> a little <S%G3641><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> kindleth! <S%G381><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> is a fire, <S%G4442><s%> a world <S%G2889><s%> of iniquity; <S%G93><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> is <S%G2525><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> members, <S%G3196><s%> that it defileth <S%G4695><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> setteth on fire <S%G5394><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> course <S%G5164><s%> of nature; <S%G1078><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it is set on fire <S%G5394><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> hell. <S%G1067><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> kind <S%G5449><s%> of beasts, <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of birds, <S%G4071><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> of serpents, <S%G2062><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of things in the sea, <S%G1724><s%> is tamed, <S%G1150><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hath been tamed <S%G1150><s%> of mankind: <S%G442><s%> <S%G5449><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G444><s%> tame; <S%G1150><s%> it is an unruly <S%G183><s%> evil, <S%G2556><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of deadly <S%G2287><s%> poison. <S%G2447><s%>

Therewith <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> bless <S%G2127><s%> we God, <S%G2316><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the Father; <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> therewith <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> curse <S%G2672><s%> we men, <S%G444><s%> which are made <S%G1096><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the similitude <S%G3669><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Out <S%G1537><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> proceedeth <S%G1831><s%> blessing <S%G2129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cursing. <S%G2671><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> ought <S%G5534><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> to be. <S%G1096><s%>

Doth <S%G3385><s%> a fountain <S%G4077><s%> send forth <S%G1032><s%> at <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> place <S%G3692><s%> sweet <S%G1099><s%> water and <S%G2532><s%> bitter? <S%G4089><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Can <S%G1410><s%> the fig tree, <S%G4808><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> bear <S%G4160><s%> olive berries? <S%G1636><s%> either <S%G2228><s%> a vine, <S%G288><s%> figs? <S%G4810><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> can no <S%G3762><s%> fountain <S%G4077><s%> both yield <S%G4160><s%> salt <S%G252><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fresh. <S%G1099><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> is a wise man <S%G4680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> endued with knowledge <S%G1990><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you? <S%G5213><s%> let him show <S%G1166><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> conversation <S%G391><s%> his <S%G848><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> meekness <S%G4240><s%> of wisdom. <S%G4678><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> bitter <S%G4089><s%> envying <S%G2205><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strife <S%G2052><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> glory <S%G2620><s%> not, <S%G3361><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lie <S%G5574><s%> not against <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>
This <S%G3778><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> descendeth <S%G2718><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> from above, <S%G509><s%> but <S%G235><s%> is earthly, <S%G1919><s%> sensual, <S%G5591><s%> devilish. <S%G1141><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> envying <S%G2205><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strife <S%G2052><s%> is, there <S%G1563><s%> is confusion <S%G181><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> evil <S%G5337><s%> work. <S%G4229><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> that is from above <S%G509><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> <S%G3303><s%> pure, <S%G53><s%> then <S%G1899><s%> peaceable, <S%G1516><s%> gentle, <S%G1933><s%> and easy to be entreated, <S%G2138><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of mercy <S%G1656><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> good <S%G18><s%> fruits, <S%G2590><s%> without partiality, <S%G87><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without hypocrisy. <S%G505><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> is sown <S%G4687><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> of them <S%G3588><s%> that make <S%G4160><s%> peace. <S%G1515><s%>
